name: reporter
description: L'application qui permet de signaler facilement les d√©sordres techniques dans un batiment
author: Donaldo DE SOUSA <donaldo.desousa@gmail.com>

scripts.build-ios: cd src-cordova && npm run xml-config-setup -- --env=prod && cd .. && quasar build -m cordova -t ios -T ios
scripts.build-android: cd src-cordova && npm run xml-config-setup -- --env=prod && cd .. && quasar build -m cordova -t ios -T android
scripts.codepush-deploy-ios: cd src-cordova && appcenter codepush release-cordova -t '*' --description "v$npm_package_version" -a SoWell-SAS/reporter.sowellapp.com-IOS -d Production -m
scripts.codepush-deploy-android: cd src-cordova && appcenter codepush release-cordova -t '*' --description "v$npm_package_version" -a SoWell-SAS/reporter.sowellapp.com-Android -d Production -m
scripts.codepush-deploy: yarn codepush-build-ios && yarn codepush-deploy-ios && yarn codepush-build-android && yarn codepush-deploy-android
scripts.release-init: yarn config set version-sign-git-tag false && yarn config set version-git-tag false && yarn config set version-commit-hooks false
scripts.release: yarn release-init && yarn version && yarn codepush-deploy && yarn release-finish
scripts.release-finish: git add . && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag -a $npm_package_version -m $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
